channel.title: Comments on: More shirt folding
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I can never tell if you're serious or kidding :-S
item.content:encoded: I can never tell if you’re serious or kidding :-S

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I meant that you first saw it on this blog :)
item.content:encoded: I meant that you first saw it on this blog :)

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
It works pretty well, however inside the folding you might get wrinkles. Let’s see what Sharon says later on.
I think I saw it at NYU, but I’m not sure (I was defiantly using the laptop). Why is it so important?
item.content:encoded:
It works pretty well, however inside the folding you might get wrinkles. Let’s see what Sharon says later on.

I think I saw it at NYU, but I’m not sure (I was defiantly using the laptop). Why is it so important?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... don't forget where you first saw it :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… don’t forget where you first saw it :)

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: I was going to say that it is so careless to use a knife over keramika, but damn, this machine seems to be so cool that I am going to build myself one!
item.content:encoded: I was going to say that it is so careless to use a knife over keramika, but damn, this machine seems to be so cool that I am going to build myself one!
